I'm a PhD student and research associate at the working group <a target="_blank" href="https://www.mediapsychology.ifp.uni-mainz.de">Media Effects and Media Psychology</a>, Department of Communication, Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz and a teaching associate at the <a target="_blank" href="https://www.phil.uni-mannheim.de/mkw/">Institute for Media and Communication Studies</a>, University of Mannheim.

- affordances of digital media
- human-AI interaction
- media entertainment experiences
